full_summary:
## Two Tank Kiln Tender Announcement
### Reference Number
WS4272098311-Doc4272136407

### Amendment Information
* Amendment Number: 4
* Amendment Date: 2024-01-24

### Tender Details
* Tender Closing Date: February 9, 2024 14:00 ET
* Tender Status: Expired
* Unspsc Code: *41100000* (Laboratory and scientific equipment)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)*
* Regions of Opportunity: None
* Regions of Delivery: Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada

### Contracting Entity Information
* Contracting Entity Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada
* Contractor's Contact Person: Ben Wong, Ben.Wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Tender Description
The Canadian Grain Commission (CGC) requires the supply and delivery of one (1) laboratory-scale kiln to be integrated into the Grain Research Laboratory (GRL) pilot malting plant. The kiln must mimic a full-scale kiln and is a two-unit system capable of processing up to two independently sampled items each weighing up to 8 kg. Deliveries will be made to Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada. Please submit all supporting documentation and bids by the closing date and time to avoid being declared non-responsive. 

### Notice URL
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18231768?extsite=MTgyMzE3NjhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Let me know if there is anything else I can assist you with.
